tweet: Cardano update 1.2 is on schedule for a mid-April release. Looks like we are finally getting paper wallets. Some more performance and bug fixes as well.
Athens was quite successful. Cardano presentation, lots of business dev meetings, and some hiking and butterflies  https://t.co/pFYmu6aXgk

This #Cardanowhiteboard outlines the work that has gone into the Cardano Settlement Layer since its development began in 2016. Consisting of three main parts – Core, wallet and networking – George Agapov explains the development process here:  https://t.co/OGlW2TMzmO #Cardano $Ada
$ADA bounce on the 0.5 fibonacci level.   Could be going towards 3000 sats, if this is the 3rd wave unfolding.  That should be great.

$ada #ada #cardano  This is what I'm expecting from $ada.  Like many coins, it bounced on the 0.5 fibonacci level. Still expecting upmoves to 3000 sats+.   $trx and other coins had the same sort of pattern.  Always use a stop/loss to minimize losses.  https://t.co/goAEHw1tTz

The IOHK team arrived at the beautiful city of Athens! @IOHK_Charles spoke to the audience at Athens Blockchain Meetup about building third-generation blockchains and also sat down for a video interview with the event organisers. #Cardano #IOHK @CardanoStiftung @cardanocom  https://t.co/LYMjnerOCO
